paragraphs.body: The Complete 3-Book Collection cover art features ${link_0} ${link_1} in the ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: The Complete 3-Book Collection cover art features Avatar Aang in the Avatar State.

paragraphs.body: The Complete 3-Book Collection is the boxed set containing all sixty-one episodes from ${link_0}, as well as the bonus material from all of the other collections.
paragraphs.text: The Complete 3-Book Collection is the boxed set containing all sixty-one episodes from Avatar: The Last Airbender, as well as the bonus material from all of the other collections.

paragraphs.body: The boxed set was released in region 4 on June 4, 2009, in region 2 on August 6, 2012, and in region 1 (US & Canada) on October 6, 2015.
